metadata.description: Community-contributed plugins and extensions for Claude Code. Extends Claude Code with custom commands, agents, hooks, and integrations.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Core skills that help AI agents properly operate in repositories. Includes temporary file management with examples for Bash, Python, Node.js, Go, and Ruby.

plugins.name: prompting
plugins.description: Comprehensive prompt engineering support for Claude Code. Includes best practices skill covering 8 core principles, autonomous agent that enforces standards, and interactive command builders.
